page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: THE AREA COVERED IN THIS BLOCK IS ALMOST TOTALLY AGRICULTURAL WITH GENTLE SLOPES AND LARGE OPEN PRODUCTIVE FIELDS. IT IS VERY SPARSELY POPULATED AND COVERS THREE PARISHES WITH TWO THIRDS IN FRANSHAM, PART IN GREAT DUNHAM AND PART IN BEESTON. MANY HEDGES HAVE BEEN REMOVED TO ENLARGE FIELDS TO ACCOMMODATE LARGER AGRICULTURAL MACHINERY, BUT FOLLOWING A NATIONAL TREE PLANTING YEAR AND ENCOURAGEMENT IN THE WAY OF TREES, STAKES AND PROTECTIVE COVERS FROM THE COUNTY COUNCIL FORESTRY DIVISION YOUNG TREES HAVE BEEN PLANTED ON ROAD SIDES, IN COPSES, CEMETRIES AND ANY AREA WHERE PROTECTION FROM THE WIND IS NEEDED.
